text: "I Wanna Make You My Lady" is a song by Australian singer songwriter Mark Holden. It was recorded and released as the second single from Holden's second studio album, Let Me Love You (1976). The song was a commercial success in Australia, peaking at number 11 on the Kent Music Report. The song is an English translation of the Swedish song "Jag ska fånga en ängel", originally written by Swedish singer-songwriters Ted and Kenneth Gärdestad, with English lyrics written by Gary Osborne. ==Track listing== ;7"/ Cassette (EMI-11195) Side A # "I Wanna Make You My Lady" - 2:39 Side B # "Never Ever Monday" - 2:26 ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable" |- !align="left"|Chart (1976) !align="left"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Australia KMR | style="text-align:center;"|11 |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable" |- !align="left"|Chart (1976) ! style="text-align:center;"|Rank |- |Australia | style="text-align:center;"|73 |} ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Mark Holden songs Category:1976 singles Category:Pop ballads Category:Songs written by Ted Gärdestad Category:Songs with lyrics by Gary Osborne
title: I Wanna Make You My Lady
